data.text: @ericksonforhou1 Hi, I'm a producer at CNN. So sorry you are having to drive so far for the vaccine! Hoping you may have a few minutes to speak with me about your travel plans & what lead up to the decision to take the trip? Pls DM me here or my email is Kimberly.Berryman@warnermedia.com, thanks!
@noozelady Thank you - good advice, I will
@ericksonforhou1 Drive safely and take someone with you, please.
